bwwExcerpt: The distinctions here include a rousing, comfort-food pop score by Sara Bareilles, the singer-songwriter in her confident Broadway composing debut, and the can't-miss casting of Jessie Mueller as Jenna. Mueller, whose down-to-earth authenticity as Carole King in "Beautiful" earned her a 2014 Tony, brings an unforced honesty and creamy, plaintive, intricately colored voice to a character who keeps things real when, all around her, things threaten to become showbiz pat.
showScoreExcerpt:

This new one is an old-fashioned, well-crafted production."
